Title: Authorizes taxing jurisdictions to opt not to assess late fees, interest or penalties on real property taxes owed by a small rental business negatively impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Authorizes taxing jurisdictions to opt not to assess late fees, interest or penalties on real property taxes owed by a small rental business negatively impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic.
ActClause: AN ACT to prohibit taxing jurisdictions from assessing late fees, interest or penalties on real property taxes owed by a small rental business negatively impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic
